text: @realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall For a man with his finger on the pulse you have not achieved nothing during your Presidency. The good friend you made of Piers Morgan is trashing you as often as he does our Boris. Time to buck up your ideas as coronavirus has no social or class barriers
